Bash(PGPASSWORD=Aedr15150302 "C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\16\bin\psql.exe" -h localhost -U postgres -d attendance_system -c "
SELECT 
    a.id,
    u.""firstName"" || '' '' || u.""lastName"" as empleado,
    a.""checkInTime"",
    a.""checkOutTime"",
    a.authorization_status,
    a.authorized_by_user_id,
    a.authorized_at,
    a.authorization_notes,
    a.kiosk_id,
    a.source
FROM attendances a
JOIN users u ON a.""UserId"" = u.user_id
WHERE a.company_id = 11
ORDER BY a.""checkInTime"" DESC
LIMIT 10;
")
